calculate_demand()[source]

Calculate demand of the transport sector.

Return type:

Demand

Returns:

The demand summed over all subsectors demand in this transport sector.

calculate_demand_distributed_by_nuts2()[source]

Calculate demand of transport sector distributed by nuts2 regions.

Return type:

dict[str, Demand]

Returns:

The demand summed over all subsector in this transport sector, split by nuts2 regions.

calculate_subsector_demand(traffic_type)[source]

Calculate demand for a traffic type in the transport sector.

Parameters:

Returns:

The demand of the traffic type split in modals.

Module contents

This package holds all the modules directly representing a sector.
